text: ottakaiyilum (an, pen) iruvakai, pacuvilum iruvakai (untu. Ivviruvakaikalilulla) ankalaiya? (Allatu ivviru vakaikalilulla) penkalaiya? Allatu ivviru vakaikalilulla penkalin karppankalil ullavarraiya (iraivan) tatai ceytirukkiran? Ivvaru (tatuttu) allah unkalukkuk (kattalaiyittatakak kurukirirkale, avvaru avan) kattalaiyittapotu ninkalum munnal iruntirkala?'' Enrum napiye! Nir avarkalaik ketpiraka. Karpanaiyaka allahvin mitu poy kuri, ataraminriye (arivillata) makkalai vali ketuppavanaivita aniyayakkaran yar? Niccayamaka allah (ittakaiya) aniyayakkara makkalai nerana valiyil celuttuvatillai
